comment: Protesters start marching
BPD asks for a safe and peaceful demonstration
Protesters arrive the State House
Peaceful protest end
An officer sprays an elderly protester
BPD asks protesters to refrain from throwing things
Many officers are seen pushing protesters to the corner
An officer says, "Start spraying the fuckers."
Group of officers approach the protesters, with one officer widely spraying them
Multiple bike patrol officers run towards a protester
An officer pulls a protester's clothing
BPD asks protesters to refrain from hurting officers
BPD asks protesters to vacate the area
Multiple officers spray the protesters
An officer sprays a protester from a close distance
An officer punches a male protester
An officer says, "I wanna hit this asshole."
Protesters scream and run away form police
BPD tweets protesters "have surrendered the moral high ground."
An officer pushes a protester down
Officers chase protesters
An officer talks about using a police vehicle to attack demonstrators
BPD stresses the "officers are fighting to protect" the city
BPD again urges protesters to go home
A protester taunts officers
An officer pushes a protester down
An officer hands another officer a necktie
BPD asks protesters to vacate the area and leave the city
BPD confirms 53 arrests on the night of May 31st
